1�You open the tome to the ??Moogle's Almanack?? chapter and peruse its weather prognostication pages.
1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ????.
1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ????. There is also the possibility of ????, so caution is in order.

1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ???? with occasional ????. There is also a slight chance of ????, so caution is in order.

s.�You are unable to mine anythin

1�Your #???? break
?!�You dig up  $????, but your #???? breaks in the proces
g.�You cannot carry any more items. Your inventory is ful
1�Yaaaaaarghhh!
1�Show yourself, Zogbog! I've come to retrieve Rahal! You will return him to me this instant!
1�No skulking about the shadows today, Zogbog?Highly unusual for a habitual coward such as you.
1�Wh-what are these monstrosities!?
1�Your presumption that I might betray my own is the greatest affront, Zogbog!Steel yourself for grave disappointment, for your vile ambition shall soon be reduced to piles of rubble!
1�Commander!
1�S-surely there're environs more conducive to learning!
1�Naught ventured, naught gained!Hold fast to your objective...and chaaarge!!!
1�Past certain. I must neutralize the explosion and save him!
1�Even should I knowingly face impossible odds, I cannot leave a friend at the mercy of death.
1�A man must be prepared to bear all of life's burdens if he wishes to move forward. These are your own words.
1�A veritable den of adders...It shall be all we can do to keep them at bay until Bostillette arrives with reinforcements.
1�And boy. Think not for a moment that being here excuses you from lessons.
1�Lesson number sixty-seven...
1�Bostillette! We shall have words regarding your definition of ??nick of time?? before the day is through!
1�Wh-what strange spell is this that the colossus incants?
1�Are you certain, boy? That your friend is being held hereabouts?
1�Let me remind you, no guarantee exists that we will succeed and escape with our own lives.
1�Aptly said, boy. Very well, I shall stand beside you in this.Consider this your chance to put to practice all you've learned.
1�Let the final examination commence!
1�Hah. He's passed out from the exertion.
1�Rest easy, boy. You've passed the exam with flying colors.
1�Will these two be all right?
1�By the Goddess! I had thought it forever lost!
1�This ring disappeared from my possession sometime during the expedition to Rhazowa.Such a journey it must have made to find its way back here...
1�Shall I accompany you?
1�<Blush> A-ahem! You may take your leave of us, soldier!
1�Father...
1�Fi-fie-fo-fum, I smell the blood of a young Elvaan...
1�Hah! Spare me the mockery!The predator has no need to cower from prey!
1�Feast your eyes upon the unequalled majesty of my minions!
1�They are the ??Fangmonger Stone Legion,?? the juggernaut that shall run rampant over all of Vana'diel!
1�Into the past I shall send them, to wrest power from the weakened grips of men and beastmen both as they wage war and bleed each other dry.
1�In time, the name of the Fangmonger clan shall come to be feared the world over...and then my ascension to the Orcish throne shall be complete!
1�For old times' sake, my young nemesis, I shall make you an offer most generous. You shan't find it wanting.
1�Lay to rest your hostility towards me and join my cause.Bend your knee to me--accept me as your liege lord--and I shall make you a general among my armies.
1�Hmph. I find your lack of foresight disturbing, little rabbit.You shall come to regret spurning a place in the new Orcish Empire.
y!�Hah. More guests, and right on cue.
1�The time for talk is ended!Come face your doom, Excenmille!  !
1�Awaken, my loyal minions!
1�Go forth, Fangmonger Stone Legion! Go forth and annihilate those who would oppose my will!
!!�(Nooo! H-how could this be!?Two decades of painstaking labor undone in a single confrontation...)
1�(Mekglok! Do something, or my entire legion is finished!)
1�(D-damn it! Move, I say!Move, you worthless piece of junk!)
1�(Aaargh!!! Vex me to the very end, will you!?)
1�(Huh? S-something's amiss...)
1�(Mekglok! Explain to me what's happening!)
1�(Huh? Whither did that machine-loving misfit vanish!? Damn him thrice over!)
1�(Wh-what!? By Bakgodek's backside, who placed an order for such a hazardous feature!?)
1�(D-don't you dare abandon me, you disloyal, self-preserving wretch!)
1�(Confound it! The means to fulfilling my ambition...all spent...)
1�(Uh...easy say, difficult do, Master Zogbog.)
1�(Uh-oh. This not good. Statue go out of control.)
1�(Master Zogbog, me so sorry. Self-destruct device me fit is activate. Explosion happen soon.)
1�(Uh...m-me forget meat over cookfire. Me go now, Master Zogbog.)
1�Right in the nick of time!
1�Commander! If that Orc speaks true, we haven't a moment to lose!
1�Why do you linger!? Hurry and escape lest the explosion claim us all!
!!�Did he...do it?
1�They've fallen into a slumber of exhaustion, but have taken no permanent harm as far as I can see.
1�Hehehe. In that sentiment, you are not alone.
1�I for one could bask for eternity in the warmth of this moment, but duty calls.
1�I shall see the children returned safely to Batallia Downs.
1�Please join me at your earliest convenience,  . You shall find me by the statue where first we met.
1�I alone should suffice for this simple task, Commander.Might I suggest you take word of our success back to the Kingdom? And pay visit to Lady Altennia, too, if you've a mind?
1�Yes, sir! At once, sir!
1�I must say, gazing at the children puts me in mind of our own childhood.
1�Decked out in their swords and armor, with the Orcish warmachine standing guard over them--all of this seems to add to the vividness of my recollections.
1�Only party members present with you in this area will be transported to  �[Everbloom Hollow/the Ruhotz Silvermines/Ghoyu's Reverie].
1�Proceed?Yes.No.
g.�Your request for entry is being considered.
1�Now entering  �[Everbloom Hollow/the Ruhotz Silvermines/Ghoyu's Reverie
].�You have chosen not to enter  �[Everbloom Hollow/the Ruhotz Silvermines/Ghoyu's Reverie
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.
1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Face of the Future(pt.1).Face of the Future(pt.2).
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1�You have registered a new home point!You are now able to teleport here from any other home point.
1�A home point can be set as a spot for you to return to Vana'diel when you have been knocked out. You can also use a home point to teleport to other home point
s.�What will you do?Travel to another home point.Set this as your home point.Other settings.On second thought, never mind.
1�You may change the method of selecting the area of your desired home point to teleport t
o.�Which setting would you like?My current setting.Select by region.Select by expansion.
